thread.title: Satisfied customer!!
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Satisfied customer!!

author: Satisfied customer!!
title: Satisfied customer!!
text: I spoke with Fernando at smart start today and he was a kind, caring and service oriented individual. It is not easy going through all that comes with the need for ignition interlock, but Fernando made this part of the process painless. I am so grateful for his compassion and how quickly and thoroughly he handled our phone exchange. Finally a company that cares!!
